Articles.Content:
http://www./?svsjjrd3d2uuyhc

My grandfather was a rocket scientist and died when i was only a year old. He helped design the Nike Zeus missile so in his honor i decided to build

a jet(ironically not having to with him at all except for the fact he was a rocket scientist). I probably should of made a rocket but i'm allot better at making jets than i am at making rockets. Its easy to fly can go up to around 130 m/s. No mods all vanilla. It is a little hard to land. It is very fuel efficient.

Craft File Coming Soon.

Edited October 9, 2012 by valkireace

Looks cool. I tried to make a jet once and failed. I couldn't figure out how to get the flappy things to stick to the edge of the wing instead of ontop. Ya... flappy things... deal with it. Anyway, I seem to be having way too much fun launching rockets and doing space stuff to try again so far but I probably will eventually.
I'm backwards.. I have better luck building stuff in in the VAB than the SPH.. all my planes end up... unstable... at best.
